original_text:
but your iniquities have made a separation
    between you and your God,
and your sins have hidden his face from you
    so that he does not hear.
korean_text: 오직 너희 죄악이 너희와 너희 하나님 사이를 갈라 놓았고 너희 죄가 그의 얼굴을 가리어서 너희에게서 듣지 않으시게 함이니라

sentences.original_text: but your iniquities have made a separation
and your sins have hidden his face from you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희의 죄가 그의 얼굴을 너희에게서 가렸으니

sentences.original_text: so that he does not hear.
